scripts.build: npm run clean && cp -rf client/ www/client && cp -rf node_modules www/node_modules && cp -rf public/ www/public && cp config.js contacts.js server.js package.json Procfile .npmrc www
scripts.zip: npm run build && cd www && zip -r -D ../app.zip *
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && eb list && eb use Application1-dev && eb deploy
